trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""> </xref> elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is a child element of the `<federatedAuthentication>` element; the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to an instance of the CookieHandlerElement class.
trans-unit.target: O `<cookieHandler>` elemento é um elemento subordinado do `<federatedAuthentication>` elemento; a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como uma instância de classe CookieHandlerElement.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is used to configure the cookie handler used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM), which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O `<cookieHandler>` elemento é utilizado para configurar o processador de cookie utilizado pela sessão de autenticação módulo (SAM), que é representado pela <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler can be configured in one of the following ways: - To configure a chunked cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element for your chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser configurado um processador de cookie de uma das seguintes formas: - para configurar um processador de segmentos de cookie, defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade quer <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>e defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>propriedade com o elemento de configuração para o processador de cookie fragmentada.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>propriedade não deve ser definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size, you can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property as mentioned earlier, but leave both the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> properties unset.
trans-unit.target: -Para configurar um processador de cookie segmentos com o tamanho de segmento predefinido, pode definir o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade tal como mencionado anteriormente, mas deixe ambos o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a custom cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element that identifies the type of your custom cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: -Para configurar um processador de cookie personalizado, defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>e defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>propriedade com o elemento de configuração que identifica o tipo de processador do cookie personalizado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type must derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo tem de derivar da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>propriedade não deve ser definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um processador de cookie fragmentada.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<chunkedCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é equivalente à `<chunkedCookieHandler>` elemento subordinado do `<cookieHandler>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a chunked cookie handler, an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler> class, to use.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um processador de segmentos de cookie, uma instância do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>classe, para utilizar.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: If it is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property should be set to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver definido, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade deve ser definida para um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property is set to either of these values but the ChunkedCookieHandler property is not set, a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) is configured.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade está definida para qualquer um destes valores, mas a propriedade ChunkedCookieHandler não for definido, um processador de cookie segmentos com o tamanho de segmento predefinido (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) está configurado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Either the ChunkedCookieHandler property or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ChunkedCookieHandler ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>propriedade pode ser definido, mas não ambos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"></xref> that provides additional configuration for the chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"> </xref> que fornece uma configuração adicional para o processador de cookie fragmentada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um tipo de processador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set when a custom cookie handler is being configured.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade tem de ser definida quando está a ser configurado um processador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<customCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é equivalente à `<customCookieHandler>` elemento subordinado do `<cookieHandler>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a custom cookie handler type to use.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um tipo de processador de cookie personalizado para utilizar.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade for definida, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The custom type specified by this property must be derived from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: O tipo personalizado especificado por esta propriedade tem de ser derivado da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property or the CustomCookieHandler property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: É o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>propriedade ou a propriedade CustomCookieHandler pode ser definido, mas não ambos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"></xref> that defines the custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"> </xref> que define o tipo de processador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the domain value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de domínio para escritas pelo processador de cookies.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `domain` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `domain` atributo o [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: The domain value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de domínio.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new cookie handler based on the configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um processador de cookie com base nas propriedades de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a cookie handler that is consistent with the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve um processador de cookie é consistente com a configuração.

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler returned will be either a chunked cookie handler or a custom cookie handler depending on how the configuration properties are set.
trans-unit.target: O processador de cookie devolvido será um processador de cookie fragmentada ou um processador de cookie personalizado, dependendo de como as propriedades de configuração estão definidas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: O processador de cookie.

trans-unit.source: This will be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"></xref> depending on the kind of handler that is configured by the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá ser uma instância de <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"> </xref> dependendo do tipo de processador que está configurado pelas propriedades da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler cannot be created from the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar um processador de cookie a partir das propriedades da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property of the cookies written by this handler should be set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""> </xref> propriedade cookies escrito por este processador deve ser definida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property should be set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""> </xref> propriedade deve ser definido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookie handler mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de cookie de processador.

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref> value that indicates the kind of cookie handler that is being configured.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de processador de cookie que está a ser configurado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref>, which indicates a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"> </xref>, que indica que um processador de cookie fragmentada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name for any cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de base para qualquer cookies escritos pelo processador.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `name` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `name` atributo o [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: The base name for the cookies.
trans-unit.target: O nome de base para os cookies.

trans-unit.source: The default is “FedAuth”.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é "FedAuth".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de caminho para escritas pelo processador de cookies.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o caminho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime of cookies issued by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a duração de cookies emitidos pelo processador.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `persistentSessionLifetime` atributo o [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the cookie lifetime.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>que representa a duração de cookie.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 days (“0.0:0:0”).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0 dias ("0.0:0:0").

trans-unit.source: The value must be a value between 0 (“0.0:0:0”) and 365 (“365.0:0:0”) days.
trans-unit.target: O valor tem de ser um valor entre 0 ("0.0:0:0") e a 365 dias ("365.0:0:0").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the cookie should be used only with SSL.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o cookie deve ser utilizado apenas com SSL.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cookie só deve ser utilizado através de uma ligação SSL; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
